Question: Who all are the Guest of Honours in the conference?
English Version 1: Can you list the Guest of Honours for the event?
English Version 2: Who are the dignitaries attending the conference?
Hinglish Version 1: Conference ke Guest of Honours kaun hain?
Hinglish Version 2: Guest of Honours ki list de sakte hain?
Hinglish Version 3: Is event me kaun-kaun special guests hain?
Answer:
The Guest of Honours for the AI 360 Advanced Powered Learning Conference are:
• Panneerselvam (PS) Madangopal – Chief Executive Officer, MeitY Startup Hub, Ministry of Electronics & IT.
• Prof. Anil Kashyap – President & Chancellor, NICMAR University, Director General, NICMAR.
• Prof. (Dr.) Simon Mak – 1st American Founding Vice Chancellor in India, Universal AI University, Bombay.
• Dr. Ashwin Fernandes – Executive Director, AMESA QS Quacquarelli Symonds.
• Prof. Parag Shah – Director, MIDAS School of Entrepreneurship, Founding Chairman, Flame University, Pune.
• Dr. Madhu Chitkara – Co-Founder & Pro-Chancellor, Chitkara University, Punjab & HP.
• Dr. Swati Mujumdar – Pro-Chancellor, Symbiosis Skill Universities, Indore & Pune.
• Col. Yogesh Joshi – Director, Hinjawadi Industries Association (HIA), Pune Maharashtra.

Question: Who is Panneerselvam (PS) Madanagopal?
English Version 2: Who is PS Madanagopal, and what does he do?
Hinglish Version 2: PS Madanagopal ke baare mein bata sakte hain?
Hinglish Version 3: Panneerselvam Madanagopal kaun hai aur kya karte hain?
Answer: Panneerselvam (PS) Madanagopal is the Chief Executive Officer of MeitY Startup Hub, under the Ministry of Electronics & Information Technology.

Question: What is Panneerselvam Madanagopal's role in AI & technology?
English Version 1: How has PS Madanagopal contributed to AI and technology?
English Version 2: What is PS Madanagopal’s significance in AI?
Hinglish Version 1: Panneerselvam Madanagopal AI aur technology me kya role play karte hain?
Hinglish Version 2: AI aur technology me PS Madanagopal ka kya yogdan hai?
Hinglish Version 3: PS Madanagopal AI aur tech field me kya kaam kar rahe hain?
Answer: He leads MeitY Startup Hub, supporting tech-driven startups and AI innovation initiatives.
